name: Anne Springs Close Greenway
description: A 2,100-acre nature preserve offering hiking, biking, horseback riding, and paddling.

name: Historic Downtown Fort Mill
description: Charming historic district with shops, dining, and community events.

name: Carolina Thread Trail
description: A regional network of trails and greenways promoting outdoor recreation and connectivity.

name: Fort Mill History Museum
description: Museum showcasing local history, Civil War artifacts, and cultural exhibits.

name: Tega Cay Marina
description: Marina on Lake Wylie offering boat rentals, fishing, and water sports.

name: Walter Elisha Park
address: 1101 Gold Hill Rd, Fort Mill, SC 29708
description: Public park featuring playgrounds, picnic areas, walking trails, and sports facilities.

name: Bond Park
description: Large park with athletic fields, walking trails, a playground, and a fishing pier.

name: Fort Mill Farmers Market
description: Local farmers market featuring fresh produce, handmade goods, and community gatherings.
